Title: An arduous journey scroll (six). Grasslands
Designer: Ying Yeping (应野平)Wang Huanqing (汪欢清)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Crossing the grasslands in Northern Sichuan - actually a very dangererous area of marshes - took the Communists a week in August 1935. It is said that this stage of the Long March cost most lives, from exhaustion and malnutrition or by drowning.Nr. 6 of the poster set An arduous journey.This is a print from the tenth edition (January 1965).
